description: This file implements a C module for creating, managing, and canceling various types of repeating tasks or timers. It provides functions to start repeating tasks with different scheduling strategies, cancel them, or modify their delays. It manages task execution in background threads, with synchronization mechanisms to control start, pause, and cancellation, supporting functionalities like back-off strategies and fixed-rate scheduling for background task execution in an embedded or concurrent system.

methods.name: uint32_t createRepeatingTask(uint64_t delayAmount,delayUnits units,taskCallbackFunc func,void * arg)
methods.description: Creates a basic repeating task with specified delay and callback function, which loops until canceled.

methods.name: uint32_t createFixedRateRepeatingTask(uint64_t delayAmount,delayUnits units,taskCallbackFunc func,void * arg)
methods.description: Creates a fixed-rate repeating task that maintains a consistent interval between executions, regardless of callback duration.

methods.name: uint32_t createBackOffRepeatingTask(uint64_t initDelayAmount,uint64_t maxDelayAmount,uint64_t incrementDelayAmount,delayUnits units,backOffTaskRunCallbackFunc runFunc,backOffTaskSuccessCallbackFunc successFunc,void * arg)
methods.description: Creates a back-off style repeating task with increasing delay between repetitions until a maximum delay is reached.

methods.name: void * cancelRepeatingTask(uint32_t task)
methods.description: Cancels a running repeating task, waiting for its thread to terminate and returning the user-provided argument.

methods.name: void shortCircuitRepeatingTask(uint32_t task)
methods.description: Immediately triggers the next execution of a repeating task by bypassing its current delay.

methods.name: void changeRepeatingTask(uint32_t task,uint32_t delayAmount,delayUnits units,bool changeNow)
methods.description: Modifies the delay of an existing repeating task, optionally applying the change immediately.

methods.name: uint64_t calcBackOffDelayAmount(uint64_t currentDelay,uint64_t startDelay,uint64_t incrementDelay,uint64_t maxDelay)
void calcTimeToPause(struct timespec * executeTime,struct timespec * pauseTime)

uint32_t initRepeatingTask(uint64_t delayAmount,uint64_t initDelayAmount,uint64_t maxDelayAmount,uint64_t incrementDelayAmount,delayUnits units,taskCallbackFunc func,backOffTaskRunCallbackFunc backOffRunFunc,backOffTaskSuccessCallbackFunc backOffSuccessFunc,void * arg,repeatingTaskType taskType)
void populateTimespecDelay(uint64_t delay,delayUnits units,struct timespec * delaySpec)

ctags.name: BACK_OFF_REPEATING_TASK_TYPE
ctags.pattern: /^    BACK_OFF_REPEATING_TASK_TYPE        \/\/ back off repeating task type$/

ctags.name: FIXED_RATE_REPEATING_TASK_TYPE
ctags.pattern: /^    FIXED_RATE_REPEATING_TASK_TYPE,     \/\/ fixed rate repeating task type$/

ctags.name: NORMAL_REPEATING_TASK_TYPE
ctags.pattern: /^    NORMAL_REPEATING_TASK_TYPE,         \/\/ basic repeating task type$/

ctags.name: REPEAT_TASK_SHORT_CIRCUIT

ctags.name: REPEAT_TASK_WAITING
